name: Catfish
description: Catfish are bottom-dwelling fish found in rivers, lakes, and ponds. Known for their whiskers and tough constitution.
behavior: Slow, scent-driven feeders. Often found near submerged debris or deep channels.

conditions.moon: Waning moon draws them from depths

gear: Stink bait, chicken liver, or dip bait
techniques: Fishing during the night with strong scent bait
Using slip sinker rigs in current
whisper: The catfish knows the deep. Trust what lives below the surface — silence is not absence.
